resources.string: In order to take a photo, click on the \"plus\" or slide your finger from right to left across the screen. After the image is uploaded, click \"Rotate\" (if necessary) and click \"Find text\".

The library displays your added books. When connected to the Internet, you can click on any of the books to see more detailed information. If there are many books, you can pull your finger from top to bottom (and vice versa) to see the rest.
After the book has been recognized or selected in the library, a window will open with detailed information. When you press the \"Add\" / \"Del\" key, the book will be added / removed in the library.
